snippet: Samuel Rahamin Topaz planned to travel to Turkey and told the authorities that he sympathized with the Islamic State, officials said.
abstract: Samuel Rahamin Topaz of Fort Lee, NJ, pleads guilty on terrorism charges for planning to travel abroad to join Islamic State; agrees to cooperate with government investigation of other men he was to travel with.
lead_paragraph: Samuel Rahamin Topaz planned to travel to Turkey and told the authorities that he sympathized with the Islamic State, officials said.

headline.main: New Jersey Man Pleads Guilty to Pledging to Join ISIS
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Man Pleads Guilty Over His Plan to Join ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
